text.autoconfig.footprintparticle.title: Footprint Particle
text.autoconfig.footprintparticle.option: How fast do particles disappear during rain compared to normal

Use to prevent print gen under terrain
when enable normal map in shader mod.

Blocks that footprint will appear.
Format: §9§omodid:blockid§r or §9§o#modid:blocktag§r
Higher priority than hardness filter.

Adjust print offset when gen on those blocks.
Format: §9§omodid:blockid,height§r or §9§o#modid:blocktag,height§r
Take effect when you stand IN that blocks.

Blocks that footprint will NOT appear.
Format: §9§omodid:blockid§r or §9§o#modid:blocktag§r
Lower priority than applied.
Allow gen for entity has Invisible?

Mobs in this list will not generate footprint.
Format: §9§omodid:mobid§r

Set a separate print size multiple for a mob.
Format: §9§omodid:mobid,size§r
Lower priority than excluded.

Mobs in this list will have a specific front-back offset to gen.
They'll also changed frequency when is mounted or dismounted.
Format: §9§omodid:mobid,value§r
0.75 will be used if value is empty.

Mobs in this list will have a specific left-right offset to gen.
Format: §9§omodid:mobid,value§r
0.9 will be used if value is empty.

Control how long the time of Watermark gen
after you away from water/rain.
Set 0 to disable watermark.
The §lWatermark§l is gen when footprint cannot gen.
It's ignored block list.

Mob in this list which SecondPerPrint
will multiply by specific value.
Format: §9§omodid:mobid,value§r

Measure in pixel. 
Change it to actual texture width for better visual if you using custom texture.

Set a specific texture for a specific mob.
Format: §9§omodid:mobid,fileName1,fileName2,...§r
§5file§r must be a PNG and located at
§oassets/footprintparticle/textures/particle§r
in your resourcepack.
Meanwhile, you need to register it at
§oassets/footprintparticle/particles/footprint.json§r or
§oassets/footprintparticle/particles/watermark.json§r
if you want to replace watermark at same time.
More see in wiki.

Block which hardness smaller than gate will gen print.
You can set 0 to disable all blocks (whitelist), or 999 to allow all blocks (blacklist)
Default is 0.7
Kick up snow (when print gen on it)
Kick up splash (when walking on rain)
